lyrics_80s: The phone rings, in the middle of the night. My father yells...
The phone rings, in the middle of the night. My father yells...
Just a small town girl livin' in a lonely world...
She says, we've gotta hold on to what we've got. It doesn't make a difference if we make it or not...
Every breath you take. And every move you make. Every bond you break, every step you take...
'Cause we are living in a material world...
Karma karma karma karma karma chameleon...
Oh, I wanna dance with somebody. I wanna feel the heat with somebody. Yeah, I wanna dance with somebody...
Never gonna give you up. Never gonna let you down...
The phone rings, in the middle of the night. My father yells...
And I can feel it coming in the air tonight...
lyrics_2010s: I got the eye of the tiger, a fighter. Dancing through the fire. 'Cause I am a champion...
I got the eye of the tiger, a fighter. Dancing through the fire. 'Cause I am a champion...
